name: Mejai's Soulstealer
simpleDescription: Grants Ability Power for kills and assists

passives.name: Glory
passives.effects: Gain 4 stacks for each champion [[kill]] and 2 stacks for each [[assist]], up to a '''maximum''' of 25 stacks. For every stack, gain {{as|5 ability power}}, up to {{as|125|AP}} at '''maximum''' stacks. If you have at least 10 stacks, also gain {{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}. Lose 10 stacks on [[death]]. Stacks are preserved from {{ii|Dark Seal}}.
